title: Love Hearts Font
content:
Dear Typophiles,

We have been asked to create a font for the attached PDF. We need a font to start with and  
then we can add the internal stars ourselves.

If anyone has any ideas of a close match, then please let yourself be heard.

Many thanks in advance.

Neil

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lovehearts.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002705/http:/typophile.com/files/lovehearts.pdf) | 51.92 KB |
author: schaffs

comments.content:
It's tough to find something that heavy, but you could start with [Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002705/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=E.105369.2.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=LOVE+HEARTS&sampleSize=48), [Elan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002705/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.108257.0.9&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=LOVE+HEARTS&sampleSize=45), [Copperplate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002705/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120832.0.9&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=LOVE+HEARTS&sampleSize=42), or [Matinee Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002705/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.10464.2.9&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=LOVE+HEARTS&sampleSize=46).

Whatever you choose, make sure you are properly licensed to modify it and create a new font.
